website_summaries.verdict: A swiveling mirror designed for rear-facing car seats so parents can view the infant passenger fully.
pros: Mirror glass is designed to be shatterproof
Straps anchor the convex mirror so that front seat caretaker has full-body view of child
A low price for a quality item
cons: A few owners say they have to readjust their view more times than they would like

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Mirror
customer_reviews.text: After we installed this in my husband's car, he said to me that we must write a 5-star review for it, so here it is. This is the best baby mirror we've owned. The reflection is so clear and we can see exactly what our son is doing in the back seat. We have a fixed headrest in my husband's car and this thing does not move going over bumps. We liked it so much we put it on my son's Christmas list so I could have one for my car even though I already have a different brand one in my car. We were disappointed we didn't have this mirror for our first kid! And it's so cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Riss

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted in a baby mirror +more!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this mirror! It was super easy to install and took me less than a minute! It pivots to you can adjust it very easily to any position. The mirror part is made of a non breakable material, but reflects beautifully with a wide angle. I am very happy with my purchase. Also they sent a free Baby ON Board sign for your car which was nice 😊 Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Minayiram

customer_reviews.title: Good But Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to affix to the headrest and how the pivoting mirror does not move during car rides. It is a really good product. It was so good that my fiance decided to keep it in her car after we came back from a trip to my parents! In my search to find this mirror again, I managed to find the same kind of mirror only from a different brand and the mirror was LARGER. So I had to get it. In short, this product is good, but it would be great if the mirror was a little bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: DjDASH

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super excited when I received the mirror! I installed it in less than 5 minutes. I even got a BABY ON BOARD sign that came with the mirror. I've always wanted one of those!! The mirror is as big as the head rest. Was able to adjust it with ease, to where I can see my baby. I can clearly see him from my rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Average purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for reflection quality, but the mirror on the ball joint inches downwards with the vibration of the car. Also, after about 4 months of usage, the strap holding one of the clips, came undone and I had to use rubber bands to affix it on the headrest.

customer_reviews.title: Works well

The suction cup is small so it keeps sliding down and needs to be adjusted. It may be because the seats are leather. I'm not sure if it slides with cloth seats. The image is clear enough in the rear view mirror but it does look a bit stretched out horizontally because of the curvature. It's a inexpensive mirror that gets the job done.
